internationalizations.description: Specialized in operations analysis and operations management, my core competences is operations research. Over the next few years, I intend to develop as a software engineer, in order to widen my toolbox for my management skills and knowledge. For that, I have learned a bit more about frontend technologies, data engineering, DevOps, software architecture, and even product management as well. I have worked on different business cases with/for different companies during my education, and have developed a lot of different optimization techniques.
